characters.clothing: Fine clothes now torn and dirty

characters.appearance: Boy, 13 years old, brave despite fear

scene.mainElements: Rough log stockade under attack, defenders desperately holding position against unseen pirates in surrounding jungle
scene.details: Wooden palisade with British flag flying defiantly, musket smoke drifting across compound, water barrel with ladle, scattered supplies, palm trees and tropical vegetation pressing close, bullet holes in logs, abandoned pirate hat in dirt
scene.background: Dense jungle concealing attackers, glimpses of movement in foliage
scene.atmosphere: Desperate defense, heat and gunpowder, civilization's last stand against piracy

composition.cameraAngle: Inside stockade looking out toward jungle
composition.focus: Defenders at wall preparing for next assault
composition.depth: Defenders and stockade wall foreground, cleared ground middle distance, threatening jungle background
